title: Mastering Little Navmap: Adding Procedures to Your Flight Plan | Beginner to Advanced Guide
description:
In one of my previous videos we did a complete walkthrough specifically for Little Navmap. We discussed how to get it, how to install it, how to set it up and walked through the process of planning a flight.

In this new video we look at some specific parts of Little Navmap which we didn't discuss in a lot of detail in the previous video. We will look at how to add standard terminal arrival routes (STAR's), arrivals and adding a parking spot.

0:00 intro
0:10 why to add a standard terminal arrival route (STAR) 
1:26 finding and adding the right standard terminal arrival route (STAR) and approach
5:38 revolving errors
6:56 exporting the flight plan for MSFS and adding a parkingspot
9:03 closing out
